description: Focused ROI Calculation Engine for business value modeling with sophisticated NPV/IRR calculations, multi-tenant architecture, and Sales Assistant integration with Fathom meeting intelligence for AI-powered proposal generation.

features.name: Core ROI Calculation Engine
features.description: Sophisticated financial modeling with NPV/IRR calculations, cashflow analysis, and 8+ cost models (hard/soft categorization, labor, compliance, IT infrastructure, training).

features.name: Multi-Tenant Administration
features.description: Full RBAC system with 4 roles (Super Admin, Tenant Admin, Manager, User), tenant/organization/user management, session isolation, and comprehensive admin dashboard.

features.name: Input Data Management
features.description: Process CRUD operations, labor modeling, complexity metrics, and data validation with hard gates to prevent dummy data.

features.name: Financial Results & Analysis
features.description: ROI display with scenarios, opportunity matrix visualization, risk analysis, and comprehensive financial reporting.

features.name: AI-Powered Proposal Generation (DEPRECATED)
features.description: Legacy proposal builder - being migrated to Sales Assistant. Will be removed in v0.3.0. Use 'Export to Sales Assistant' feature instead.

features.name: Sales Assistant Integration with Fathom Meetings
features.description: Complete webhook-based integration to export ROI data to Sales Assistant for AI proposal generation. Includes customer identification (company name, email domain, contacts), pre-send validation to check for Fathom meetings, automatic meeting linking via email domain matching, and AI synthesis of meeting transcripts. Proposals include insights from both ValuDock ROI data and Fathom conversation intelligence.
features: Email domain matching for Fathom meetings
Pre-send validation: Check if meetings exist before export
Warning display if no meetings found
User decides to proceed or cancel
Automatic meeting linking in Sales Assistant
AI synthesis of meeting transcripts (goals, challenges, stakeholders)
Rich proposal context from customer conversations

features.name: Fathom Meeting Intelligence Integration
features.description: Meeting intelligence with automatic transcripts, challenge/goal extraction, and context enrichment from recorded meetings.

features.name: Visual Workflow Design System
features.description: Drag-and-drop workflow builder with complexity gathering and visual process mapping.

features.name: Export & Presentation Tools
features.description: Multi-format export (PDF, Excel, Gamma) with presentation mode for stakeholder demos.

features.name: Authentication & Authorization
features.description: JWT authentication, multi-tenant session isolation, RBAC with 4 role levels, and secure credential management.

features.name: Cost Classification System
features.description: Hard/soft cost categorization with validation gates and comprehensive cost modeling.

features.name: Admin Tools & Diagnostics
features.description: Debug console, API testing interface, analytics dashboard, and system diagnostics.

features.name: Advanced AI Integration
features.description: Complete Fathom client implementation and full challenge/goal extraction from meeting transcripts.

features.name: Enhanced Analytics & Reporting
features.description: Advanced analytics views and custom report generation capabilities.

planned_features.name: Advanced Scenario Planning
planned_features.description: Multi-scenario modeling with what-if analysis and comparison tools.

planned_features.name: Enhanced Risk Analysis
planned_features.description: Comprehensive risk assessment with mitigation strategies and probability modeling.

planned_features.name: Billing & Usage Analytics
planned_features.description: Usage tracking, billing integration, and tenant analytics.

planned_features.name: Advanced Reporting & Export
planned_features.description: Custom report builder with advanced export formats.

planned_features.name: Team Collaboration Features
planned_features.description: Real-time collaboration, comments, and shared workspaces.

planned_features.name: Mobile Application
planned_features.description: Native iOS and Android mobile applications.

planned_features.name: Gamma Deck Integration
planned_features.description: Enhanced Gamma deck generation and presentation tools.
